prompt_template: The normal filing deadline for an online self assessment return is {gap1} after the end of the tax year, and the normal payment deadline is {gap2} after the end of the tax year.
explanation: For most individuals: online filing and payment are due by 31 January following the tax year.

prompt_template: A lifetime gift to an individual is a {gap1}. If the donor survives {gap2} years, it becomes exempt.
explanation: Gifts to individuals are PETs; survival for 7 years makes them exempt.
